item.title: 欧洲央行 Wunsch 警告称通胀前景风险犹存
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员皮埃尔-温施（Pierre Wunsch）仍然认为消费者价格面临危险，包括如果货币政策与美国的差异过大，欧元将走软。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Pierre Wunsch still sees dangers for consumer prices – including a weaker euro should monetary policy diverge too much from the US.】

item.title: 债券反弹后，高盛、斯通港撤回对阿根廷的押注
item.description: 今年，阿根廷主权债务的涨势令人瞠目，但投资者开始回撤，原因是哈维尔-米莱伊总统在推行严厉的紧缩政策的同时，也面临着如何保持选民支持的挑战。【原文：Investors who rode an eye-popping rally in Argentina’s sovereign debt this year are starting to pull back, citing President Javier Milei’s challenge to hold onto voter support while chasing a harsh austerity agenda.】

item.title: 伊斯坦布尔机场运营商酝酿与美国和巴基斯坦开展海外合作
item.description: 伊斯坦布尔耗资 110 亿美元新建机场的运营商正在探索进军北美、中东和巴基斯坦等全球市场，以实现业务多样化和扩张。【原文：The operator of Istanbul’s new $11 billion airport is exploring a global foray into markets including North America, the Middle East and Pakistan as it seeks to diversify and expand its operations.】

item.title: 澳大利亚支持价值 470 亿美元的天然气产业在转型中发挥作用
item.description: 澳大利亚正在呼吁开发新的天然气资源，以确保天然气价格保持在可承受的范围内，并使该国继续成为主要出口国，这是中左翼工党政府加大对化石燃料支持力度的最新转变。【原文：Australia is calling for the development of new natural gas resources to ensure it remains affordable and the nation continues as a major exporter, the latest shift by the center-left Labor government toward greater support for the fossil fuel.】

item.title: 智利通胀加速，引发对降息的谨慎态度
item.description: 智利上个月的消费者物价涨幅超过预期，这凸显出智利央行在过去一年率先在拉美降息后，对进一步降息持谨慎态度。【原文：Chile’s consumer prices rose more than forecast last month, underscoring the central bank’s caution over further interest rate cuts after it spearheaded reductions in Latin American over the past year.】

item.title: 英国因涉嫌间谍活动将驱逐俄罗斯外交官
item.description: 英国内政大臣詹姆斯-克莱弗利（James Cleverly）告诉议会，英国正在驱逐一名俄罗斯高级外交官，这是他所说的莫斯科在英国收集情报的打击行动的一部分。【原文：The UK is expelling a top Russian diplomat, Home Secretary James Cleverly told Parliament, as part of a crackdown on what he said was Moscow’s intelligence-gathering in Britain.】

item.title: 监管审查后，Raiffeisen 取消俄罗斯计划
item.description: Raiffeisen Bank International AG 取消了一项复杂的股份交易，该交易的目的是在监管机构审查后将资本带出俄罗斯。【原文：Raiffeisen Bank International AG canceled a complex share deal aimed at bringing capital out of Russia after scrutiny by regulators.】

item.title: 伍德集团拒绝 Sidara 14 亿英镑的收购提议
item.description: 约翰伍德集团（John Wood Group Plc）表示，它拒绝了家族工程公司 Sidara 14 亿英镑（18 亿美元）的出价。【原文：John Wood Group Plc said it rebuffed a £1.4 billion ($1.8 billion) bid from family-owned engineering company Sidara.】

item.title: 战争引发继承难题，富裕的俄罗斯人陷入困境
item.description: 对于俄罗斯的精英阶层来说，家族财富的传承比以往任何时候都更加复杂。【原文：For Russia’s elite, passing on family wealth has become more complex than ever.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司第一季度利润下降
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）报告称，第一季度利润下降，但与收费相关的盈利有所增长。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management reported a decline in first-quarter profits but notched growth in its fee-related earnings.】

item.title: 干旱削弱经济，赞比亚货币跌至历史最低点
item.description: 赞比亚的货币对美元贬值至历史新低，因为该国经济正与四十多年来最严重的干旱和拖延多年的债务重组进程作斗争。【原文：Zambia’s currency depreciated to a record low against the dollar as the economy struggles with the worst drought in more than four decades and a debt restructuring process that’s dragged on for years.】

item.title: 基金对欧洲天然气的看涨程度为危机初期以来最高
item.description: 投机者对欧洲天然气的看涨程度是能源危机初期以来最高的，这表明，即使在夏季来临之际，人们也越来越担心供应会出现紧张。【原文：Speculators are the most bullish on European gas since the early days of the energy crisis, signaling growing concerns about tightening supplies even as summer takes hold.】

item.title: 土耳其的通胀数学不再令投资者望而却步
item.description: 土耳其的通胀预测仍然令人难以置信，但这一次，市场上很少有人抱怨。【原文：Turkish inflation forecasts still strain belief — but this time, few in the market are complaining.】

item.title: 美国 30 年期抵押贷款利率自 3 月以来首次下降
item.description: 美国的抵押贷款利率自 3 月下旬以来首次下降，这给购房者带来了一些宽慰，并提升了购房和再融资的申请量。【原文：US mortgage rates fell for the first time since late March, giving some relief to homebuyers and lifting applications for purchases and refinancing.】

item.title: 可可的剧烈波动波及咖啡市场
item.description: 今年以来，可可和咖啡已交织在一起，极端天气和短缺助长了这两种商品的上涨，考验着交易商的极限。【原文：Cocoa and coffee have become intertwined this year, with extreme weather and shortages fueling rallies of both commodities that test the limits of traders.】

item.title: 土耳其考虑提高高收入家庭的能源费用
item.description: 据一位知情的高级官员透露，土耳其正在制定一项计划，为不同收入群体制定不同的天然气和电力收费标准。【原文：Turkey is working on a plan to set different natural gas and electricity tariffs for different income groups, according to a senior official with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 剧烈波动持续，可可两天内涨幅近 20
item.description: 可可在纽约市场攀升，创下自 1999 年以来的最大涨幅。【原文：Cocoa climbed in New York — adding to its biggest rally since 1999 — as volatility continues to grip the market beset by severe shortages.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。股市继续反弹，Reddit 股价跳涨，苹果公司从中国获得提振。以下是市场动态— David Goodman【原文：Good morning. The rally in stocks continues, Reddit shares jump and Apple gets a boost from China. Here’s what’s moving markets— David Goodman】

item.title: 工程公司 Sidara 考虑收购约翰伍德集团的可能性
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，家族工程公司 Sidara（前身为 Dar Group）正在探索收购在伦敦上市的约翰伍德集团（John Wood Group Plc）的可能性。【原文：Sidara, the family-owned engineering company formerly called Dar Group, is exploring a potential acquisition of London-listed John Wood Group Plc, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 伦敦在欧洲首次公开募股交易量中的份额已降至仅 2
item.description: 伦敦错过了欧洲首次公开募股市场反弹的机会，这再次表明伦敦作为上市目的地的前景日渐暗淡。【原文：London is missing out on a rebound in Europe’s initial public offering market, in yet another sign of its waning prospects as a listing destination.】

item.title: 孟加拉国提高关键政策利率以抑制通胀
item.description: 孟加拉国中央银行提高了关键利率，因为这个南亚国家正努力抑制通胀压力。【原文：Bangladesh’s central bank raised its key interest rate as the South Asian nation seeks to tame inflationary pressures.】

item.title: 阿斯利康以需求不足为由撤回 Covid-19 疫苗
item.description: 阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）从市场上撤下了其 Covid-19 疫苗，原因是市场对该疫苗的需求不足。【原文：AstraZeneca Plc pulled its Covid-19 vaccine from the market due to lack of demand for a shot that initially raised hopes it would play a key role in protecting the world against the virus.】

item.title: 碧桂园要求中国国家担保人支付债券利息
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，中国开发商碧桂园控股有限公司（Country Garden Holdings Co.【原文：Chinese developer Country Garden Holdings Co. is seeking help from a state-backed program guaranteeing developer bonds to pay interest due Thursday, said people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 意大利零售业债券需求下降，显示出买家疲劳迹象
item.description: 意大利人正在减少购买针对个人储蓄者的债券，这让人怀疑政府今后在多大程度上可以依赖这一资金来源。【原文：Italians are buying fewer bonds targeted at individual savers, raising questions over the extent to which the government can rely on this funding source in future.】

item.title: 乌克兰真理报》称，大亨科洛莫斯基被控下令袭击
item.description: 据媒体报道，乌克兰当局怀疑商人伊戈尔-科洛莫斯基（Igor Kolomoisky）在二十多年前组织了一起未遂的合同杀人案，这给这位曾经支持过沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）的在押富豪增加了新的潜在刑事责任。【原文：Ukrainian authorities suspect businessman Igor Kolomoisky of organizing an attempted contract killing more than two decades ago, according to media reports, adding a new layer of potential criminal liability to the jailed tycoon who once backed Volodymyr Zelenskiy.】

item.title: 乌克兰能源交易商计划拓展欧洲市场以增加供应
item.description: 乌克兰能源公司 DTEK 的贸易部门计划雇佣更多员工，并进入液化天然气市场，以期与欧洲其他地区建立更紧密的联系。【原文：The trading arm of Ukrainian energy company DTEK plans to hire more staff and enter the liquefied natural gas market in a bid to forge closer ties with the rest of Europe.】

item.title: 印尼发出不再加息的信号，承诺加强印尼盾
在产能过剩的担忧下，中国开始为电池行业的繁荣降温
item.description: 中国公布的规则草案似乎旨在减缓其电池行业的快速扩张；这是美国和欧洲抱怨中国产能过剩的一个主要目标。【原文：China unveiled draft rules that appear aimed at slowing the breakneck expansion of its battery industry — a key target of US and European complaints about Chinese overcapacity.】
